text: @realDonaldTrump There are now 1,214,023 cases of #COVID19 in the #USA & 69,974 #American deaths. How can you people possibly gloat about how good of a job you have done. Have you no shame? #Trump does not have the maturity, compassion or temperament to lead. If you don't see that, you are blind.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.
